description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Health Services assigns a nurse to every school site to assist students with health conditions or special education plans. A school may have a nurse for 8 to 40 hours a week depending on its needs. Nurses conduct special education assessments, state-mandated hearing and vision screenings, and refer families to other agencies. Health Services is a ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"entry-hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Community Schools","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"4wonz26xnwa4d2o2bjXd1H","type":"Link","linkType":"Entry"}}}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" service.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
